pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, September 27, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, September 27, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Prime Minister of Saint Lucia, Allen Chastanet, and the Prime Minister of St. Kitts and Nevis, Timothy Harris.

Prime Minister’s Office
Centre Block
Parliament Hill

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Minister for Heritage, Mélanie Joly, will attend National Holocaust Monument Inauguration Ceremony and will deliver remarks.

Canadian War Museum
Corner of Wellington Street and Booth Street

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity of visit of Monument
  • Open coverage of remarks in Canadian War Museum
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

Media appearance

  • An interview with the Prime Minister will be posted on TodayWithTray’s YouTube channel.
